articles.name: Flexbox Guide
articles.description: This beginner-friendly guide to flexbox is a must for new developers! It's easy to read, easy to understand and I use it everyday when coding. When it's you against your memory this guide is a must for you. Thank me later!

articles.name: How to create a reusable React button component
articles.description: This article provides new developers with beginner-friendly guidance on creating reusable React components, focusing on buttons. It covers the basics of component creation, styling, and interactivity, helping them grasp essential React concepts and component-based development principles.

articles.name: How to merge branches to GitHub
articles.description: Do you like me struggled - or struggle - to merge branches to Github? Then this guide is for you! I used to waste so much time trying to figure out how to merge, hours of chatgpt, until I found this guide. Just like with the flexbox-guide: thank me later for this one too!

articles.name: How is == Different from === in JavaScript?
articles.description: This article clarifies the differences between the '==' and '===' operators in JavaScript, highlighting how they handle type coercion through examples. It recommends using the strict equality operator '===' for more predictable outcomes, making it a must-read for JavaScript learners seeking clarity in their coding practices.
